channel.description: Blood and shadow grimoire addressed to me and for my use.

item.title: There
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Pathogenicus serves as my structure that binds all my intentions and offers my essential context in which I interpret narrative synthesis. Incorporating significant performance influences facilitates infusion of my overarching narrative with a particular style and enhances coherence of my narrative. The period between historical narratives provides a generalized representation of my world that surrounds […]

The post There appeared first on Pathogenicus Work.

item.title: Here
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Adventure pollination involves generating synthesized associations and expanding upon them to establish a preliminary set of potential storylines and character weavings, which I will call a story network and character technique mechanism systemizing. I can employ sporing at an intersection of a chronicle or even later on, and it is particularly useful when I excel […]
